message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $170. It's a great deal for a high-quality item!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down to $150, but I can't go any lower than that. It's still a very competitive price for what you're getting.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
